袸字的基本解释

袸
jiàn
小带。
褰脬衣。

袸
zùn
衣襟。

袸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》在甸切，去霰，從。］
(1)衣小带。
(2)褰脬衣。
[②]［zùn］
［《集韻》徂悶切，去，從。］
衿，衣襟。

袸字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　袸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1116第03
【唐韻】徂尊切【集韻】徂昆切，?音存。【類篇】衣帶。【爾雅·釋器】衿謂之袸。【註】衣小帶。　又【廣韻】在甸切，音荐。　又【集韻】徂悶切，存去聲。義同。　又【玉篇】褰脬衣。

袸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
袸字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" is cutting in Dian, go to ha, follow. ]
(1) Clothing straps.
(2) Clothing.
[②]［zùn］
["Jiyun" is dull and cut, go to , follow. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　袸; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1116 Page 03
[Tang Yun] Zu Zun cut [Ji Yun] Zu Kun cut,? Sound storage. 【Classes】Clothes and belts. 【Erya·Release Device】It is called the qi. [Note] Small clothing belt.　[Guangyun] It’s cut in Dian, the sound is recommended.　[Jiyun] again, dull and cut, save the sound. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Yuyi.
